title: auRa eSports Sydney Lan Team Plat plus
body:
As Season 4 ends, auRa eSports will be looking to compete in Season 5 in attempt to make a name of themselves, we are currently looking for a few roles

We are looking for friendly and loyal people ready to take losses well but also always celebrate a win. Constructive criticism is key to moving on.

REQUIREMENTS
-**MUST LIVE IN SYDNEY**
- Platinum or higher solo queue rating
- Willing to travel to offline tournaments throughout the year
- Constantly pushing yourself to get better at the game, keeping a professional perspective on the game
- Vocal in-game, even when down. Seriously focusing on the situation, etc
- 18 or very close to it
- Available to compete in online tournaments on weekends or possibly in midweek and also scrim / ranked 5s throughout the week at around 7:30 pm til late AEST 
- Able to critique each other in a positive manner and not taking it personally


APPLYING:

If this sounds like you, PM me here on Cybergamer with this information:

IGN -
Age -
Location -
Current rating -
Role & Champion pool -
Any competitive experiences prior - 

PM me or add auRa Valkyrie if interested.
